body: Kalsoom at CHUP -Changing Up Pakistan informs about two great efforts - 1) ThinkChange Pakistan, a blog that aims to track the social entrepreneurship and innovation space in Pakistan and 2)  Gawaahi, a new online initiative aiming to archive digital stories of abuse, survival and resistance.
original_body: Kalsoom at CHUP -Changing Up Pakistan informs about two great efforts - 1) ThinkChange Pakistan, a blog that aims to track the social entrepreneurship and innovation space in Pakistan and 2) Gawaahi, a new online initiative aiming to archive digital stories of abuse, survival and resistance.
title: Pakistan: Two Great Online Initiatives
